Articles.Content:
I start my save normally, but when I go to this ship (it only happens with this one) this happens

And that doesn't go whatever I do, also I can't create new maneuver nodes or if I can they are bugged.

(I press the ''Add Maneuver'' button and nothing shows up)

It doesn't go away if I go to the tracking station...

Neither if I go to other ships.

Even in the main menu! I have to completely restart the game to make it disappear.

Does anyone have any idea why this happens or how to solve it?

I see you have a lot of mods installed, do you have any mods that modify or create maneuver nodes for you? One of those mods might be bugged.

If you do have one of those mods, uninstall it, and reboot the game and create a maneuver node. See if it does anything.
old thread but I suspect the battery is dead.  Is that possible?
Considering the OP has probably long resolved their issue, I'm going to lock this thread and let it die.
